Record Class FragmentedText.Fragment

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.dua3.utility.text.FragmentedText.Fragment
Record Components:
x - the x-position
y - the y-position
w - the width
h - the height
baseLine - the baseline value (of the line the fragment belongs to
font - the font
text - the text
Enclosing class:
FragmentedText
public static record FragmentedText.Fragment(float x, float y, float w, float h, float baseLine, Font font, CharSequence text) extends Record
A text fragment that can't be split (i.e., contains no whitespace) and has a uniform font so that it can be drawn in a single operation.

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object); primitive components are compared with the compare method from their corresponding wrapper classes.
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:
      o - the object with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if this object is the same as the o argument; false otherwise.
